/**
     * Create a default number format.  The default number format is based on
     * {@link NumberFormat#getInstance()} with the only customizing is the
     * maximum number of fraction digits, which is set to 2.
     * @return the default number format.
     */
/** * Modify the imaginaryCharacter. * @param imaginaryCharacter The new imaginaryCharacter value. * @throws IllegalArgumentException if imaginaryCharacter is * null or an empty string. */
/** * Modify the imaginaryFormat. * @param imaginaryFormat The new imaginaryFormat value. * @throws IllegalArgumentException if imaginaryFormat is * null. */
/** * Modify the realFormat. * @param realFormat The new realFormat value. * @throws IllegalArgumentException if realFormat is * null. */
